original: GRANHOLM, Johan Bertil, Bankdirektör, Härnösand, f Timrå, V.norrl län, 14/6 96 av handl A G o Ester Backman, gm Olga Näsström. Realex. Anst AB Ångermani folkbk, Hsand, 13—18, Skand bkn sed. 18, kamr 29, dir 41. Stdflm 35—38, dräts.kamm o byggn.-nmdn, rev lä n sia s. Sekr o skattm De blind vann i Ångml o blindvårdsnmdn i V.norrl län, skattm kult.hist museet Murberget, Hsand.
translated: GRANHOLM, Johan Bertil, Bank Director, Härnösand, born in Timrå, northern county of Västernorrland, on June 14th, 1896, to merchant A.G. and Ester Backman. Married to Olga Näsström. Attended vocational school. Employed at Ångermani Folk Bank in Härnösand from 1913 to 1918. Joined Skandinaviska banken in 1918. Promoted to clerk in 1929 and director in 1941. Served as tax commissioner and member of the building committee and county council in Västernorrland county. Secretary and treasurer of the Association for the Blind in Ångermanland and the Blind Care Committee in northern county of Västernorrland. Treasurer of the cultural-historical museum Murberget in Härnösand.

taxID.name: Association for the Blind in Ångermanland
Blind Care Committee in Västernorrland County
